registrationNumber.format: The EPREL registration number must contain exactly 6 digits (0-9).

energyClass.invalid: Invalid energy class. Please select a value from A to F.

labelUrl.invalidFormat: Please enter a valid URL for the label.

eprelHelp.title: Can't find the EPREL registration number?
eprelHelp.content: Scan the QR code on the product's energy label (printed or digital). You'll be directed to a webpage where the EPREL registration number is shown in gray in the breadcrumb navigation at the top, under Home > Product category > XXXXXX.

eprelNotice.content1: The energy labels, energy class badges, product information sheets, and associated data are located at
eprelNotice.content2: , are owned by the European Union, are licensed under the
eprelNotice.link2Text: Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license

error.retrievalFailed: Failed to retrieve Energy Label by exception: {{errorMessage}}
error.notFound: No Energy Label with the registration number {{registrationNumber}} found.
error.metadataReadError: Failed to read Energy Label metadata: {{errorMessage}}
error.metadataWriteError: Failed to write Energy Label metadata: {{errorMessage}}
